description.dutch: Strandwereld voltooid.
description.english: Completed the beach world.
description.french: Terminer le monde de la plage.
description.german: Du hast die Strandwelt abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completato il mondo delle spiagge.
description.latam: Completaste el mundo de la playa.
description.portuguese: Completaste o mundo da praia.
description.spanish: Has completado el mundo de la playa.

description.dutch: Woestijnwereld voltooid.
description.english: Completed the desert world.
description.french: Terminer le monde du désert.
description.german: Du hast die Wüstenwelt abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completato il mondo desertico.
description.latam: Completaste el mundo del desierto.
description.portuguese: Completaste o mundo do deserto.
description.spanish: Has completado el mundo del desierto.

description.dutch: Bergwereld voltooid.
description.english: Completed the mountain world.
description.french: Terminer le monde des montagnes.
description.german: Du hast die Bergwelt abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completato il mondo montuoso.
description.latam: Completaste el mundo de la montaña.
description.portuguese: Completaste o mundo da montanha.
description.spanish: Has completado el mundo de la montaña.

description.dutch: Ruïnewereld voltooid.
description.english: Completed the ruins world.
description.french: Terminer le monde des ruines
description.german: Du hast die Ruinenwelt abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completato il mondo delle rovine.
description.latam: Completaste el mundo de las ruinas.
description.portuguese: Completaste o mundo das ruínas.
description.spanish: Has completado el mundo de las ruinas.

description.dutch: Vulkaanwereld voltooid.
description.english: Completed the volcano world.
description.french: Terminer le monde du volcan.
description.german: Du hast die Vulkanwelt abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completato il mondo vulcanico.
description.latam: Completaste el mundo de los volcanes.
description.portuguese: Completaste o mundo do vulcão.
description.spanish: Has completado el mundo del volcán.

description.dutch: Van het wateroppervlak af gesprongen.
description.english: Jumped off the surface of the water.
description.french: Sauter à la surface de l'eau.
description.german: Du bist von der Wasseroberfläche abgeprallt.
description.italian: Riemerso sulla superficie dell'acqua.
description.latam: Saliste saltando de la superficie del agua.
description.portuguese: Saltaste da água.
description.spanish: Has saltado de la superficie del agua.

description.dutch: Minder dan 10 keer doodgegaan in Tegen de klok.
description.english: Completed a time attack with less than 10 deaths.
description.french: Terminer un Chrono en mourant moins de 10 fois.
description.german: Du bist bei „Gegen die Zeit“ weniger als 10-mal gestorben.
description.italian: Completata una sfida a tempo con meno di 10 morti.
description.latam: Finalizaste un contrarreloj con menos de 10 muertes.
description.portuguese: Completaste um contrarrelógio com menos de 10 mortes.
description.russian: Пройти игру на время, погибнув меньше 10 раз.
description.spanish: Has completado una contrarreloj con menos de 10 muertes.

description.dutch: Alle munten in elk level verzameld.
description.english: Collected all coins in every level.
description.french: Récupérer toutes les pièces de chaque niveau.
description.german: Du hast in jedem Level alle Münzen gesammelt.
description.italian: Raccolte tutte le monete in ogni livello.
description.latam: Recogiste todas las monedas de cada nivel.
description.portuguese: Arrecadaste todas as moedas de cada nível.
description.russian: Собрать все монеты во всех уровнях.
description.spanish: Has recogido todas las monedas en cada nivel.

description.dutch: Rang S verdiend in elk level.
description.english: Earned an S-rank in every level.
description.french: Obtenir le rang S dans chaque niveau.
description.german: Du hast in jedem Level den S-Rang erreicht.
description.italian: Ottenuto un voto S in ogni livello.
description.latam: Obtuviste un Rango S en cada nivel.
description.portuguese: Alcançaste uma classe S em todos os níveis.
description.russian: Получить оценку S в каждом уровне.
description.spanish: Has logrado el rango S en cada nivel.

description.dutch: Level voltooid zonder dood te gaan in Tegen de klok.
description.english: Completed a level without dying in Time Attack mode.
description.french: Terminer un niveau en mode Chrono sans mourir.
description.german: Du hast bei „Gegen die Zeit“ ein Level gemeistert, ohne zu sterben.
description.italian: Superato un livello senza morire in modalità Sfida a tempo.
description.latam: Superaste un nivel sin morir en el modo contrarreloj.
description.portuguese: Venceste um nível no contrarrel-ógio sem sofrer quaisquer mortes.
description.russian: Пройти уровень в игре на время, ни разу не погибнув.
description.spanish: Has superado un nivel sin morir en el modo contrarreloj.

description.dutch: Level voltooid binnen de doeltijd.
description.english: Completed a level within the target time.
description.french: Terminer un niveau dans le temps imparti.
description.german: Du hast ein Level innerhalb der vorgegebenen Zeit gemeistert.
description.italian: Completato un livello nel tempo obiettivo.
description.latam: Superaste un nivel dentro del tiempo objetivo.
description.portuguese: Venceste um nível dentro do tempo limite.
description.spanish: Has superado un nivel dentro del tiempo objetivo.

displayName.portuguese: No Poupar é que Está o Ganho

description.dutch: Level voltooid zonder fruit te gooien.
description.english: Completed a level without throwing any fruit.
description.french: Terminer un niveau sans jeter de fruit.
description.german: Du hast ein Level abgeschlossen, ohne Obst zu werfen.
description.italian: Completato un livello senza tirare frutti.
description.latam: Finalizaste un nivel sin arrojar ninguna fruta.
description.portuguese: Completaste um nível sem atirar qualquer fruta.
description.russian: Пройти уровень, не бросив ни единого фрукта.
description.spanish: Has completado un nivel sin tirar ninguna fruta.

description.dutch: Level voltooid zonder slechteriken uit te schakelen.
description.english: Completed a level without KO'ing any baddies.
description.french: Terminer un niveau sans éliminer d'ennemi.
description.german: Du hast ein Level abgeschlossen, ohne Gegner auszuschalten.
description.italian: Completato un livello senza eliminare cattivi.
description.latam: Finalizaste un nivel sin acabar con ninguno de los malos.
description.portuguese: Completaste um nível sem abater qualquer vilão.
description.russian: Пройти уровень, не вырубив ни единого врага.
description.spanish: Has completado un nivel sin derrotar a ningún malo.

description.dutch: Alle slechteriken in een level uitgeschakeld.
description.english: KO'd every baddie in a level.
description.french: Éliminer tous les méchants d'un niveau.
description.german: Du hast alle Gegner in einem Level ausgeschaltet.
description.italian: Eliminati tutti i cattivi in un livello.
description.latam: Acabaste con todos los malos en un nivel.
description.portuguese: Derrubaste todos os vilões de um nível.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a todos los malos en un nivel.

description.dutch: In totaal 50 kilometer gerend.
description.english: Ran a total of 50 kilometers.
description.french: Courir sur 50 kilomètres.
description.german: Du hast insgesamt 50 Kilometer zurückgelegt.
description.italian: Percorsi 50 chilometri in totale.
description.latam: Corriste un total de 50 kilómetros.
description.portuguese: Correste um total de 50 quilómetros.
description.spanish: Has corrido un total de 50 kilómetros.

description.dutch: Een level voltooid na 25 mislukte pogingen.
description.english: Completed a level after failing 25 times.
description.french:
Terminer un niveau après 25
essais.
description.german: Du hast ein Level nach 25 Fehlschlägen abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completato un livello dopo aver fallito 25 volte.
description.latam: Finalizaste un nivel después de fallar 25 veces.
description.portuguese: Completaste um nível após falhar 25 vezes.
description.spanish: Has completado un nivel después de caerte 25 veces.

description.dutch: Een totaalscore behaald van 1.000.000 in de modus SPELEN.
description.english: Got a total score of 1,000,000 in PLAY mode.
description.french:
Obtenir un score total de
1 000 000 dans le mode JEU.
description.german: Erreiche eine Gesamtpunktzahl von 1.000.000 im SPIELEN-Modus.
description.italian: Ottenuto 1.000.000 di punti in modalità GIOCA.
description.latam: Obtuviste una puntuación total de 1 000 000 en el modo JUGAR.
description.portuguese: Alcançaste uma pontuação total de 1.000.000 no modo de JOGO.
description.spanish: Has conseguido una puntuación total de 1000000 en el modo JUGAR.

description.dutch: De rang S verdiend in een level.
description.english: Earned an S-Rank in a level.
description.french: Obtenir le rang S dans un niveau.
description.german: Du hast in einem Level den S-Rang erreicht.
description.italian: Ottenuto un voto S in un livello.
description.latam: Obtuviste un Rango S en un nivel.
description.portuguese: Alcançaste uma classe S num nível.
description.spanish: Has logrado el rango S en un nivel.

description.dutch: Een Tegen de klok-spel voltooid.
description.english: Completed a Time Attack.
description.french: Terminer le mode Chrono.
description.german: Du hast einen „Gegen die Zeit“- Durchgang abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completata una sfida a tempo.
description.latam: Completaste un contrarreloj.
description.portuguese: Completaste um Contrarrelógio.
description.spanish: Has completado una contrarreloj.

description.dutch: WERELD 1-6 voltooid zonder te surfen.
description.english: Completed World 1-6 without surfing.
description.french: Terminer le monde 1-6 sans surfer.
description.german: Du hast WELT 1 – 6 abgeschlossen, ohne zu surfen.
description.italian: Completati i mondi 1-6 senza surfare.
description.latam: Completaste el MUNDO 1-6 sin surfear.
description.portuguese: Completaste os MUNDOS de 1 a 6 sem surfar.
description.russian: Пройти мир 1-6, ни разу не проехав по воде на доске.
description.spanish: Has completado el MUNDO 1-6 sin hacer surf.
